sentences.sContent: There’s no way you can disguise that southern accent.
sentences.sCn: 你是无法掩盖那南方口音的。

synos.tran: 伪装；假装；用作伪装的东西

phrases.pCn: 伪装，假扮成；托辞；以……为借口

remMethod.val: dis(分离) + guise(外表) → 使看不到真实的外表 → 掩饰； 伪装

trans.tranOther: to change the appearance, sound, taste etc of something so that people do not recognize it
